.NET Framework 3.5.name: VRTK_CustomRaycast
.NET Framework 3.5.summary: A Custom Raycast allows to specify custom options for a Physics.Raycast.
.NET Framework 3.5.remarks:
A number of other scripts can utilise a Custom Raycast to further customise the raycasts that the scripts use internally.

 For example, the VRTK_BodyPhysics script can be set to ignore trigger colliders when casting to see if it should teleport up or down to the nearest floor.

methods.id: VRTK.VRTK_CustomRaycast.CapsuleCast(VRTK.VRTK_CustomRaycast, GlobalNamespace.Vector3, GlobalNamespace.Vector3, System.Single, GlobalNamespace.Vector3, System.Single, GlobalNamespace.RaycastHit, GlobalNamespace.LayerMask, GlobalNamespace.QueryTriggerInteraction)
methods.name: CapsuleCast(VRTK_CustomRaycast customCast, Vector3 point1, Vector3 point2, float radius, Vector3 direction, float maxDistance, RaycastHit hitData, LayerMask ignoreLayers, QueryTriggerInteraction affectTriggers)
methods.summary: The CapsuleCast method is used to generate a linecast either from the given CustomRaycast object or a default Physics.Linecast.
methods.returns: Returns true if the linecast successfully collides with a valid object.

params.value: The optional object with customised cast parameters.
The center of the sphere at the start of the capsule.
The center of the sphere at the end of the capsule.
The radius of the capsule.
The direction into which to sweep the capsule.
The max length of the sweep.
The linecast hit data.
A layermask of layers to ignore from the linecast.
Determines the trigger interaction level of the cast.

methods.syntax: public static bool CapsuleCast(VRTK_CustomRaycast customCast, Vector3 point1, Vector3 point2, float radius, Vector3 direction, float maxDistance, RaycastHit hitData, LayerMask ignoreLayers, QueryTriggerInteraction affectTriggers)
